author: jshlee
body:
implementation of GEM vfat dataformat to readout v3
* updated unpacker/packer to use both v3 and v2
* updated electronics mapping to use both v3 and v2
* backwards compatible with v2
* simplified data structure of fedraw data 
* improve amc13, amc and geb data collection
* updated DQM to match the changes

@kpedro88 @hyunyong @watson-ij
title: GEM unpacker for  VFat V3
